explanation:
code_hardening: none; behavior and checks are preserved exactly as in the original implementation.
resolve_compilation_errors: renamed the method from encode(byte[]) to encodeBytes(byte[]) while keeping the static context and relying on the existing ALPHABET field defined in the class.
exception_handling: none; no try/catch blocks were added or removed.
logic_customization: none; the Base64 encoding algorithm and all operations remain unchanged.
refactoring: updated the method name and corresponding Javadoc to encodeBytes, and applied minor formatting adjustments (spacing, brace placement, switch layout) without altering logic.
misc: reformatted indentation and spacing for consistency with the surrounding code style; no new APIs were introduced.
